items.description: A heading with multiple level support.

items.name: hr-node

items.description: A horizontal rule component with focus states.

items.name: paragraph-node

items.name: search-highlight-node

items.description: A component that highlights search results in text.

items.name: slash-node

items.name: table-node
items.title: Table Element
items.description: A table component with floating toolbar and border customization.

items.name: tag-node
items.title: Tag Element
items.description: A tag element component with selection states and styling.

items.name: toc-node
items.title: TOC Element
items.description: A table of contents component with links to document headings.

items.name: toggle-node
items.title: Toggle Element
items.description: A collapsible component for toggling content visibility.
